metadata.titleEn: Reasonable livestock carrying capacity estimation product of grassland in Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (2000-2019)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原草地合理载畜量数据集（2000-2019）
metadata.description: Reasonable carrying capacity, also known as theoretical carrying capacity, refers to the maximum number of domestic animals that can be carried by a certain grassland area in a certain period of time under the premise of moderate grazing (or mowing) and maintaining sustainable production of grassland to meet the needs of normal growth, reproduction and production of livestock. Based on the MODIS inversion data of forage yield (fresh weight, kg / hm2), the reasonable carrying capacity of grassland (sheep unit, mu / km2) was evaluated according to the code for calculation of grassland carrying capacity and grass livestock balance (DB 51 / t1480-2012) and calculation of reasonable carrying capacity of natural grassland (NY / T 635-2015), The time series is 2000-2019, and the spatial resolution is 250m. This data set can analyze the temporal and spatial variation characteristics of the theoretical carrying capacity under the condition of rational utilization of grassland in the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, evaluate the carrying capacity characteristics of grassland in the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, and extract the overgrazing areas, which has important application value for ecological protection, monitoring and early warning of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau.
metadata.descriptionCn: 合理载畜量又称理论载畜量，指一定的草地面积，在某一利用时间段内，在适度放牧（或割草）利用并维持草地可持续生产的前提下，满足家畜正常生长、繁殖、生产的需要，所能承载的最多家畜数量。青藏高原合理载畜量数据利用基于MODIS反演的可食牧草产草量（鲜重，kg/hm2）数据，按照《草地载畜量及草畜平衡计算规范》（DB 51/T1480—2012）、《天然草地合理载畜量的计算》（NY/T 635—2015）评估得到草地的合理载畜量（羊单位，MU/km2）数据，时间序列为2000-2019年，空间分辨率为250米。本数据集可以分析青藏高原草地合理利用情况下理论承载量的时空变化特征，评估青藏高原草地承载特征，提取过渡放牧区域，对青藏高原生态保护、监测及预警具有重要应用价值。
metadata.instructions: QZGY_ CC_ 2000. Img, qzgy denotes the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, CC (carry capacity) denotes the reasonable carrying capacity, and the number 2000 denotes the year. The example shows the reasonable carrying capacity of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau in 2000. The data format is. Img format, and the data reading method is ArcGIS. The unit is sheep unit / square kilometer. It represents the carrying capacity of sheep per square meter.
metadata.instructionsCn: QZGY_CC_2000.img,QZGY表示青藏高原，CC即 carry capacity表示合理载畜量，数字2000表示年份。示例内容表示青藏高原2000年合理载畜量。数据格式为.img格式，数据读取方式为：ArcGIS。单位为羊单位/平方公里。表示每平方公司承载的换算为羊单位的载畜量。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features and specifications of data collection methods used to estimate the reasonable livestock carrying capacity on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau from 2000 to 2019?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 2000年至2019年在青藏高原上估算合理牲畜承载能力的数据收集方法的关键特征和规格是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: MODIS satellite data, forage yield in fresh weight (kg/hm2), Grassland Carrying Capacity and Grass-Livestock Balance Calculation Specification (DB 51/T1480—2012), Calculation of Natural Grassland Reasonable Carrying Capacity (NY/T 635—2015), reasonable carrying capacity in sheep units (MU/km2), time series from 2000 to 2019, spatial resolution of 250 meters
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: MODIS卫星数据，新鲜重量的牧草产量（kg/hm²），草地载畜量和草畜平衡计算规范（DB 51/T1480—2012），天然草地合理载畜量计算（NY/T 635—2015），合理载畜量以羊单位表示（MU/km²），时间序列从2000年到2019年，空间分辨率为250米。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'reasonable livestock carrying capacity' mean in the context of pasture management on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原的牧场管理中，“合理的牲畜承载能力”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Reasonable livestock carrying capacity, also known as theoretical carrying capacity, refers to the maximum number of livestock that can be supported by a certain area of grassland within a specific time period, under conditions of moderate grazing or mowing that maintain the sustainable productivity of the grassland. This concept helps to meet the normal growth, reproduction, and production needs of livestock, ensuring sustainable use of grassland resources.
Definition.AnswerCn: 合理的牲畜承载能力，也称为理论承载能力，是指在适度放牧或割草的条件下，某一草地在特定时间内能够支持的最大牲畜数量，从而维持草地的可持续生产力。这个概念有助于满足牲畜的正常生长、繁殖和生产需求，确保草地资源的可持续利用。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the temporal patterns in reasonable livestock carrying capacity data from 2000 to 2019 suggest about the sustainability and management practices of grasslands on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 2000年至2019年合理的牲畜承载能力数据中的时间模式可以对青藏高原草地的可持续性和管理实践提出哪些建议？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The temporal patterns in reasonable livestock carrying capacity data from 2000 to 2019 can indicate changes in the sustainability and management practices of grasslands on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. These patterns, derived from MODIS-based estimations of edible forage yield, reflect the grassland's ability to support livestock under sustainable grazing conditions. By analyzing these patterns, researchers can identify trends in grassland utilization, assess grassland carrying characteristics, and detect regions subject to overgrazing. Such insights are crucial for ecological protection, monitoring, and early warning systems on the plateau.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 2000年至2019年合理的牲畜承载能力数据中的时间模式可以指示青藏高原草地的可持续性和管理实践的变化。这些模式源自基于MODIS的可食用饲料产量估算，反映了草地在可持续放牧条件下支持牲畜的能力。通过分析这些模式，研究人员可以识别草地利用趋势，评估草地承载特征，并检测过度放牧的区域。这些见解对于青藏高原的生态保护、监测和预警系统至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to evaluate and determine the optimal livestock carrying capacity on grasslands utilizing MODIS-derived forage yield data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用MODIS衍生的牧草产量数据评估和确定草地最佳牲畜承载能力的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The evaluation of optimal livestock carrying capacity on grasslands is conducted by utilizing forage yield data derived from MODIS. The procedures involve assessing the edible forage production in terms of fresh weight (kg/hm2) and applying the guidelines from 'The Grassland Carrying Capacity and Grass-Livestock Balance Calculation Standard' (DB 51/T1480—2012) and 'The Calculation of Reasonable Livestock Carrying Capacity for Natural Grasslands' (NY/T 635—2015). This results in the estimation of the reasonable livestock carrying capacity in sheep units (MU/km2) over a temporal span from 2000 to 2019, with a spatial resolution of 250 meters.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在草地上进行最佳牲畜承载能力评估时，利用MODIS获取的饲料产量数据。该程序涉及评估可食用饲料的生产量，以鲜重（kg/hm2）为单位，并应用《草地承载能力与草畜平衡计算标准》（DB 51/T1480—2012）和《天然草地合理牲畜承载能力计算》（NY/T 635—2015）的指导原则。这导致对2000年至2019年期间合理牲畜承载能力的估算，以羊单位（MU/km2）表示，空间分辨率为250米。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What advancements in satellite imaging and data processing techniques have enabled the estimation of reasonable livestock carrying capacity on grasslands with high spatial resolution?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些卫星成像和数据处理技术的进步使得能够以高空间分辨率估算草地的合理牲畜承载能力？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The estimation of reasonable livestock carrying capacity on grasslands with high spatial resolution is enabled by the use of MODIS satellite data for retrieving edible grass yield (fresh weight, kg/hm2). This data is processed in accordance with established standards like 'DB 51/T1480—2012' and 'NY/T 635—2015' to evaluate reasonable carrying capacity (sheep units, MU/km2) over a time series from 2000 to 2019, with a spatial resolution of 250 meters.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 利用MODIS卫星数据获取可食用草产量（鲜重，kg/hm²），可以高分辨率地估算草原上合理的牲畜承载能力。该数据按照《DB 51/T1480—2012》和《NY/T 635—2015》等既定标准进行处理，以评估2000年至2019年间的合理承载能力（羊单位，MU/km²），空间分辨率为250米。
